articles.description: Josh Adams, Bundee Aki and Wyn Jones are all set to make their British and Lions Test debuts in Saturday's series decider against South Africa.
articles.content:
Josh Adams, Bundee Aki and Wyn Jones are all set to make their Test debuts for the British and Irish Lions after being named in a much-changed starting XV for Saturday's series decider.

articles.title: IOC has launched investigation into Belarusian sprinter Krystsina Tsimanouskaya's refusal to go home - Business Insider South Africa
articles.description: Krystsina Tsimanouskaya feared being jailed for criticizing her coaches. The IOC wants a report from the Belarus Olympic Committee on her by the end of the day.
articles.content:
The International Olympic Committee (IOC) is awaiting a report from the Belarusian National Olympic Committee on its handling of sprinter Krystsina Tsimanouskaya, reported Reuters.

articles.title: ESA preps for Venus flybys later this month - htxt.africa
